verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
We rest on Thee
Our Shield and our Defender
We go not forth
Alone against the foe
Strong in Thy strength
Safe in Thy keeping tender
We rest on Thee
And in Thy Name we go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yea, in Thy Name
O Captain of salvation
In Thy dear Name
All other names above
Jesus our Righteousness
Our sure Foundation
Our Prince of glory
And our King of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We go in faith
Our own great
Weakness feeling
And needing more
Each day Thy grace to know
Yet from our hearts
A song of triumph pealing
We rest on Thee
And in Thy Name we go

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We rest on Thee
Our Shield and our Defender
Thine is the battle
Thine shall be the praise
When reigning in
The Kingdom of Thy splendor
Victors we rest with Thee
Through endless days
